item.title: Test Katex Integration
item.description: An nth Partial Sum: $$ \sum_{i=1}^n i = \frac{n(n-1)}{2} $$ A code example: int main(int argc, char *argv[]) { int count = 0; int max = argv[1]; for (int i = 1; i <= max; i++) { count += i; } std::cout << "Sum: " << count << std::endl; } Product $\prod_{i=a}^{b} f(i)$ inside text. A chemical formula: $C_p[\ce{H2O(l)}] = \pu{75.3 J // mol K}$ A little bit more complex:
